scripts.build: docker build . -t challenge-frontend -f ./docker/frontend.DockerFile && docker build . -t challenge-backend -f ./docker/backend.DockerFile
scripts.dev:lint: docker exec back_end npm run lint && docker exec front_end npm run lint
scripts.dev:backend: docker compose -f ./docker/compose.yml --profile database-only up -d && docker compose -f ./docker/compose.yml --profile back-only up -d
